post.text: My acceptance speech was 75 minutes 'long!' Watch how long it really was - - - by watching the 28 second video below. THANK YOU #TrumpTrain - I love you! Lets MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN! -DJT

comment.author: Jessica
comment.text: Great speech Mr. Trump...BUT you forgot our youngest and most vulnerable children, the great potential of future America. Stop abortion, end it now. We are drowning in the blood of these children who are killed by the millions and millions.

replies.author: Athena
replies.text: Defending planned parenthood will be a great start.

replies.author: Jennifer
replies.text: He defended planned parenthood in an interview saying he was against that and it would come to an immediate stop, wish he would have mentioned that also in his speech,because Trump isn't for killing of the young and you can believe that will come to a stop.

replies.author: Jessica
replies.text: Let fight for it, pray for it an dhope for it!
